trends: There have been 188 other sightings in Austin
There were no other sightings in Austin on or around October 11th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside having my am coffee and was watching the stars and even saw a satelite. I live in the country outside of Austin and have no light pollution. I saw a couple of shooting stars then I noticed a cluster of lights that were bouncing around. There was one brighter light pulsating then about 7 smaller ones that would bounce around.The smaller ones looked like they were merging into the larger light.The brighter light would also move around. I saw the same thing in a different location several mornings ago but in a different location. That cluster was not there this am- If it was a group of stars they should had been in the same place I originally saw them.Eventually the sun came up.The lights were in the sw direction between San Antonio and Austin.
Summary: bright light with small cluster of lights bouncing around
